definition: petit bourgeois/yuppie/abbr. of 小資產階級|小资产阶级

sentences.english: The decoration in Jono chinese-western restaurant is vogue and contracted, where the environment is full of bourgeoisie feeling.
sentences.chinese: 金牛角王的裝修時尚而簡約，環境充滿小資情調。

sentences.english: Financial crisis made many petty bourgeois become grass roots.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，金融危機草菅了許多小資白領。

sentences.english: The small property all has slight of nervous prostration disease.
sentences.chinese: 小資都有輕微的神經衰弱症。

sentences.english: Sometimes I want to have cups of tea with friend as a petty bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我想和朋友一起去品茶，偶爾享受小資的生活。

sentences.english: What I like is the endowment of articles, fashionable and let people yearning.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡的是那些小資類的文章，時髦而又讓人嚮往。

sentences.english: Listen to your babble incessantly about your little life.
sentences.chinese: 聽你不停的嘮叨關於你的小資生活。

sentences.english: Brand seems like"a embroidered pillow", undistinguished but ambitious to exceed petty bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 品牌是平庸但又渴望超越小資們的一隻繡花枕頭。

sentences.english: Advocating Petty Bourgeoisie in disguise whitewash.
sentences.chinese: 鼓吹小資情調是變相的粉飾太平。

sentences.english: You this pure petty bourgeoisie ah, I put coffee to you to open.
sentences.chinese: 你這純粹的小資啊，我把咖啡給你打開。

definition: style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
minority of the population/non-mainstream (activity, pursuit etc)/niche (market etc)
upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
in touch with the common people/down-to-earth
lit. dazzling with paper and gold (idiom); fig. indulging in a life of luxury
